incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to Multiple Networks in Brunei

incident_updates.body: We are observing an improvement on SMS delivery delays and failures when sending messages to multiple network in Brunei. Our engineers are monitoring the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information is available.

We are observing an improvement on SMS delivery delays and failures when sending messages to multiple network in Brunei. Our engineers are monitoring the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information is available.

We still continue to experience SMS delivery delays and failures when sending messages to multiple network in Brunei. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience SMS delivery delays and failures when sending messages to multiple network in Brunei. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience SMS delivery delays and failures when sending messages to multiple network in Brunei. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

This is related to another incident that was previously resolved - https://status.twilio.com/incidents/b91ldvw6fc52.

We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to DTS network in Brunei. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

This is related to another incident that was previously resolved - https://status.twilio.com/incidents/b91ldvw6fc52.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to DTS network in Brunei. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

This is related to another incident that was previously resolved - https://status.twilio.com/incidents/b91ldvw6fc52.

We are still experiencing latency and timeout errors for Twilio Rest API, impacting the following Twilio services: Verify Silent Network Auth. Customers may experience error HeaderEnrichmentRedirect." Required header x-msisdn after redirect is missing". Our engineering team is actively working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience latency and timeout errors for Twilio Rest API, impacting the following Twilio services: Verify Silent Network Auth. Customers may experience error HeaderEnrichmentRedirect."Required header x-msisdn after redirect is missing". Our engineering team is actively working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience latency and timeout errors for Twilio Rest API, impacting the following Twilio services: Verify Silent Network Auth. Customers may experience error HeaderEnrichmentRedirect."Required header x-msisdn after redirect is missing". Our engineering team is actively working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We keep experiencing latency and timeout errors for Twilio Rest API, impacting the following Twilio services: Verify Silent Network Auth. Customers may experience error HeaderEnrichmentRedirect."Required header x-msisdn after redirect is missing". Our engineering team is actively working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We keep experiencing latency and timeout errors for Twilio Rest API, impacting the following Twilio services: Verify Silent Network Auth. Customers may experience error HeaderEnrichmentRedirect."Required header x-msisdn after redirect is missing". Our engineering team is actively working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience  latency and timeout errors for Twilio Rest API, impacting the following Twilio services: Verify Silent Network Auth. Customers may experience error HeaderEnrichmentRedirect."Required header x-msisdn after redirect is missing". Our engineering team is actively working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently investigating latency and timeout errors for Twilio Rest API, impacting the following Twilio services: Verify Silent Network Auth. Customers may experience error HeaderEnrichmentRedirect."Required header x-msisdn after redirect is missing". Our engineering team is actively working on the issue, and we will provide another update as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Accsec Indonesia API Error. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 15 January 2024 at 21:00 PST until 16 January 2024 at 03:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from T-Mobile US handsets via a subset of US Short Codes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Costa Rica SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our SMS carrier partner in Costa Rica is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 15 January 2024 at 14:00 PST until 23 January 2024 at 19:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Costa Rica handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

15 January 2024 at 14:00 PST until 15 January 2024 at 19:00 PST
16 January 2024 at 14:00 PST until 16 January 2024 at 19:00 PST
